pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with ‎Enrique Peña Nieto, President of Mexico | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Enrique Peña Nieto, President of Mexico.

The Prime Minister and the President spoke about the importance of the Canada-Mexico bilateral relationship, and discussed various areas of mutual interest including issues arising at the APEC Summit and commercial relations.
